name: TapCreatures
description:
This project is made by Ratima and Phu as part of rapid prototype assignment at SAE Perth. It is designed to be played on mobile devices.

TapCreatures is made in Unity.  Most of the assets are made by us. 

More information of the game can be viewed in our Game Design Document

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you would like to provide some feedback on the game please do via this Survey. 

Thank you for playing TapCreatures

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Programming: Ratima and Phu

Background Art/UI/Wolf/Imp: Ratima

Dragon/Slime: Phu

SFX: Myself and Phu

BG music is credited to http://musmus.main.jp/
